price: 46. Mpe lolenge moko ezalelaki bato ya Nûh liboso. Ya soló, bazalaki bato mabe.
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīna
